title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 577.8 - Certification and approval of rates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 577.8 - Certification and approval of rates

State Regulations

Payment rates established in accordance with the provisions
of section
577.7
of this Part, or revised in
accordance with the provisions of section
577.9
of this Part, shall be
certified by the commissioner and shall be approved by the Director of the

Budget. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
577.8

Amended, New

York State Register March 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 11, eff. 3/19/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
